subject: Baseball
Mergers, Acquisitions and Divestitures
lead_paragraph: The Mets weren’t the first baseball team that the hedge fund manager David Einhorn wanted to buy into; he struck out on a 2004 deal to purchase part of the Brewers.
snippet: The Mets weren’t the first baseball team that the hedge fund manager David Einhorn wanted to buy into; he struck out on a 2004 deal to purchase part of the Brewers.
